question: Question_08_(d)
statement:
Let $\displaystyle y = f(x) = 63x^{2/7}-14x^{9/7}$. Sketch the graph of
$\displaystyle y=f(x)$ and indicate the inflection point(s) on your
graph. (The results from part
\href{http://wiki.ubc.ca/Science:Math_Exam_Resources/Courses/MATH100/December_2013/Question_08_(a)}{(a)},
\href{http://wiki.ubc.ca/Science:Math_Exam_Resources/Courses/MATH100/December_2013/Question_08_(b)}{(b)},
and
\href{http://wiki.ubc.ca/Science:Math_Exam_Resources/Courses/MATH100/December_2013/Question_08_(c)}{(c)}
may be useful.)
